pkgmetadata.longdescription: The ``pyPM.ca`` population modeller (www.pyPM.ca) describes connected systems withdiscrete-time difference equations. It was developed specificallyto understand and characterize the CoViD-19 epidemic. This package, ipypm, is a convenient graphical user interface (GUI) forpyPM.ca based in interactive python widgets for use inside a Jupyter notebook.After opening the GUI in a notebook, the user can open a pyPM.ca modeland compare its predictions with data.Models and data can be accessed on the local filesystem or downloadedfrom a network server.The model parameters can be adjusted manually or by fitting to data.Models can be examined in detail and modified through the GUI, withoutprogramming.
